rect.style: stroke-width: 1; fill: none; stroke: rgb(255, 255, 255); display: inline; cursor: pointer; opacity: 0.2;

text.style: pointer-events: none; font-size: 0px; font-weight: normal; text-anchor: middle; fill: rgb(51, 51, 51); opacity: 0;
pointer-events: none; font-weight: normal; text-anchor: middle; fill: rgb(51, 51, 51); opacity: 0;
pointer-events: none; font-size: 11px;

rect.style: stroke-width: 1; fill: rgb(24, 105, 184); stroke: rgb(255, 255, 255); display: inline; cursor: default; opacity: 1;

text.style: pointer-events: none; font-size: 0px; text-anchor: middle; fill: rgb(255, 255, 255); opacity: 0;
pointer-events: none; font-weight: normal; text-anchor: middle; fill: rgb(255, 255, 255); opacity: 1;
pointer-events: none; font-size: 11px; display: none; fill: rgb(255, 255, 255); font-weight: bold;
